GSP33yasasi_u:7: (vyākhyā) īṣṭe viśvasya nityaṃ vyapagatatulanāyogyavastvantaro yo vidye
GSP33yasasi_u:8: yasyādhigatyai vidurupaniṣado dve parāṃ cāparāṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:9: yo viśvasvāntavāsī prathayati ca dhiyaṃ tasya tasyānurūpāṃ devaḥ śrīmān sa mahyaṃ pradiśatu dayayā dhīvikāsaṃ samantāt // 1 //
GSP33yasasi_u:17: advaitino hisadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyamiti kāraṇībhūtasya sacchabditasya parabrahmaṇo 'dvitīyatvaśravaṇātsatyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahmeti jñānamātratvaśravaṇācca sajātīyavijātīyasvagatabhedasāmānyaśūnyaṃ brahmaiva cinmātraṃ sat paramārthaḥ, anyatsarvaṃ tatraivāvidyayā parikalpitaṃ mithyābhūtamityāmananti tatrādvitīyaśrutestadabhimatārthapratipādakatvāsambhavaṃ varṇayitumādau tanmatamanuvadatiekameveti
GSP33yasasi_u:20: yadvā uttarārdhe tacchadbaḥ prasiddhaparāmarśī na tu yacchabdanirdiṣṭapratinirdeśarūpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:32: anyatve sadṛśatve vā dvitīyaṃ sidhyati dhruvam // 4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:33: advitīyapadasya tatpuruṣavṛttatve na dvitīyasya bādha ityāhapūrvasmin ityādinā ślokacatuṣṭayena
GSP33yasasi_u:34: tatpuruṣa iti prathamakalpe tāvaduttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:38: nañtatpuruṣe cāropitatvasya pūrvapadārthatvaṃ tasya cottarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvamiṣyate śābdikaiḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:41: nañivayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagatiriti ca śābdikānāṃ paribhāṣā /
GSP33yasasi_u:42: tathā cādvitīyapadenāropitadvitīyatvavadbrahmeti bodhe tatra dvitīyānyatvasya dvitīyasadṛśatvasya dvitīyaviruddhatvasya vā pratītiḥ phalati /
GSP33yasasi_u:44: dvitīyapratiyogikasya bhedasya sādṛśyasya vā pratibodhane pratiyogitayā dvitīyasiddherniṣpratyūhatvāditi bhāvaḥ // 3 //4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:45: viruddhatve dvitīyena tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:47: nanvevamapi dvitīyaviruddhatve brahmaṇo bodhite kathaṃ na dvitīyasya bādha ityatrāhaviruddhatvaiti
GSP33yasasi_u:50: sa ca dharmaḥ prathamatvaṃ niyamataḥ tṛtīyatvādi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:69: tato 'nyattadviruddhaṃ vā sadṛśaṃ vātra vakti saḥ // 8 //
GSP33yasasi_u:94: viśeṣaṇe vā tadbrahma tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā // 11 //
GSP33yasasi_u:104: tṛtīyaṃ tadabhāvatvaviśeṣaṇamiti prathamatvaṃ tṛtīyatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo
GSP33yasasi_u:108: brahmaṇaḥ prathamā ye ca tṛtīyādyā jagatrtraye // 12 //
GSP33yasasi_u:110: kiñca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati // 13 //
GSP33yasasi_u:116: nāsti dvitīyaṃ yasya tadbrahmetyatra pakṣe vigrahaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:118: tathā ca brahmaṇa eva dvitīyatvaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:119: tataśca brahmāpekṣayā prathamasya tṛtīyādeśca na bādho
GSP33yasasi_u:121: ādyasaṅkhyāpūrakatvaṃ prathamatvam , tritvādisaṅkhyāpūrakatvaṃ ca tṛtīyatvādīti bodhyam
GSP33yasasi_u:126: dvitve ca yacchabdārthasya brahmaṇo niṣṭhatvasaṃbandhonānvayo nopeyate;
GSP33yasasi_u:130: yato brahmaṇo bhinnaṃ nāsti tadbrahmādvitīyamiti dvitīyabādho
GSP33yasasi_u:138: yasyeti ṣaṣṭhī prakṛtyarthānviter'thāntarasaṃbandhe prāmāṇike sati saṅgacchate /
GSP33yasasi_u:139: nirviśeṣe ca brahmaṇi prakṛtyarthe padārthāntarasaṃbandhasyāsatyatvāt ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhiśca prakṛte na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ // 12 //13 //14 //
GSP33yasasi_u:142: rāhoḥ śira ityādāvabhede 'pi ṣaṣṭhyā dṛṣṭeryadabhinno dvitīyābhāvastadadvitīyaṃ brahmeti vivakṣāṃ pratikṣepati,dvitīyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:143: asataḥ satpadārthābhedastadviśeṣaṇatvamapi na yujyate iti bhāvaḥ // 15 //
GSP33yasasi_u:149: ( ityadvitīyaśruteḥ parābhimatārthe dūṣaṇanirūpaṇam ) tenādvitīyaṃ brahmeti śruterartho 'yamucyate
GSP33yasasi_u:165: prathamato brahmaṇo gaṇane kṛte tena saha gaṇanārhe dvitīyaḥ samo vādhiko vā padārthaḥ kālatraye 'pi nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:166: nanu vividhavicitrānantacidacitprapañce kathaṃ kasyacidapi brahmasamasyābhāvaḥ ? tatrāhayataiti
GSP33yasasi_u:168: tadantargatasyodumbaramaśakavatparicchinnasvarūpasvabhāvāderbhavabrahmāderapi na tena sāmyagandhaprasaṅga iti dvitīyavāgāspa datāṃ-dvitīyapadavācyatāṃ,
GSP33yasasi_u:172: tathā cānugṛhītaṃ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śrīmadvedāntadeśikacaraṇaiḥasmatpakṣe tu vṛttidvayamapi samyak
GSP33yasasi_u:178: mukhyasyaiva prathamaparigaṇanasya loke śāstre ca dṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:179: kavikulagaṇanāprasaṅge kālidāsasyaiva hi prāthamyena gaṇanaṃ kavilokaprasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:186: samasyaiva dvitīyagaṇanāyogyatvamityāśayamūlakaṃ capurā kavīnāmitiślokasyottarārdhaṃ paripaṭhyate adyāpi tattulyakaverabhāvādanāmikā sār'thavatī babhūvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:187: tathā ca bahuvrīhivṛttyā samaniṣedhaḥ phalati brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:188: muktānāmapi bhogamātrasāmyamiti na brahmaṇā saha gaṇanaṃ mukhyaparigaṇanaprastāve yuktam /
GSP33yasasi_u:189: tanmukhyaṃ vastu vastuto brahmaikameveti advitīyatvaṃ tasya pratitiṣṭhatīti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:191: na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate iti śrutyantarānusārātna tvatsamo
GSP33yasasi_u:195: colanṛpasyāsthānapaṇḍitaṃ vijityavādāhaverājāsanaṃ rājyārdhaṃ ca tatsamarpitamadhigatavanta ime paramācāryāḥ pūrvāśrame /
GSP33yasasi_u:201: yāḥ surāsuranarabrahmagarbhabrahmāṇḍakoṭayaḥ, tā veṣṇavamahāvibhūtyarṇavaviśīryamāṇa jalakaṇikāyamānāḥ tadadvitīyatvaśrutyā na bādhyanta iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:202: aupaniṣadaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ brahma śrīmannārāyaṇa eveti ca viṣṇoriti nirdeśena jñāpitam kaḥ khalvaṅgulibhaṅgena samudrān saptasaṅkhyā /
GSP33yasasi_u:204: yathaika eva savitā na dvitīyo nabhaḥsthale /
GSP33yasasi_u:205: ityuktā na hi sāvitrā niṣidhyante 'tra raśmayaḥ // 24 //
GSP33yasasi_u:209: tatsvarūpāntargatasya tena saha gaṇanāyoga ityatredaṃ nidarśanam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:211: guṇasya guṇinā saha gaṇanāyoga ityatrayathā pradhāneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:216: saṅkhyeyadravyagaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyeyo 'nyaḥ padārtho yathā gaṇyate na tathā tadguṇabhūtā saṅkhyā tena saha gaṇyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:219: tathā, pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi /
GSP33yasasi_u:221: nanu sarvaṃ tadā śobhanam ; yadi brahmavibhūtitvādau pramāṇaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:224: yathā brahmaguṇatvaṃ sidhyejjagataḥ tathaiva brahmāṃśatvaṃ pratipādayacchrutijātaṃ sarvaṃ jagata brahmāpṛthaksiddhaprakāratve vyavārthāpayadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:227: kintu viśiṣṭabrahmasvarūpāntargataprakārataikarūpatvalakṣaṇameva jagato brahmāṃśatvamiti vyajyate tathā, etāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyastaro hi saḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:234: mahimā ityanena jagato vibhūtitvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tiśayāvahatvādguṇatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:235: tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣa iti brahmaṇo jagadapekṣayātivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:236: ato na brahmasvarūpaikadeśatā mṛdaṃśateva tatpariṇāmaghaṭāderjagato yuktā
GSP33yasasi_u:239: yatra viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi samanubhūyamāne 'nyatsvatantraṃ vastu na paśyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:241: sarvaprakārakaḥ sarvātmā paraṃ brahma paramapuruṣo nārāyaṇa eva bhūmā,
GSP33yasasi_u:243: svaniṣṭhaprañcadarśananindayā ca brahmaniṣṭhatvameva tasya gamyata ityāśayena śrutyantaramupādatte udaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:244: yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnu daramantaraṃ kurute, atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavatīti taittirīyopaniṣadi
GSP33yasasi_u:245: etasmin prapañce daramalpamapi antaramantarālaṃ brahmasaṃbandhavicchedaṃ yadā paśyati tadaivāsyaivaṃ jānataḥ saṃsārabhayamupasthitamagre bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:246: paraprakriyācchāyayaivamatrārtho vivakṣito bhedamithyātvaṃ na sidhyatyetadvākyata iti bodhanāya
GSP33yasasi_u:247: paramātmani niṣṭhāśabditasya dhruvānusmaraṇasya pūrvavākyaprastutasyālpakālavicchede 'pi saṃsārabhayaprasaṅga eveti tu
GSP33yasasi_u:254: nanu virukteṣu vacaneṣu brahmavibhūtitvādau jagataḥ pratipādite 'pi
GSP33yasasi_u:255: vacanāntareṣu kāraṇamātrasya satyatvam anyasya sarvasyāsatyatvaṃ ca pratīyate iti tadanurodheneṣāṃ vyāvahārikaviṣayatvameva mantavyamiti cettatrāhavāceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:256: vacanāntareṣvapi mithyātvaṃ nocyate bhedaprapañcasya, kintu brahmātmakatvena sattaiveti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:259: vācā'sambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyamiti cchāndogye ṣaṣṭhaprapāṭhake /
GSP33yasasi_u:267: kena spṛṣṭamityākāṅkṣāyāṃntvetha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti pūrvaprakṛto mṛtpiṇḍo yogyatvātkartṛtayānveti
GSP33yasasi_u:268: ghaṭatvādyavasthārūpo vikāraḥ tattadavasthāyogaprayuktaṃ ghaṭādināma ca mṛtpiṇḍenaiva gṛhītaṃ vākpūrvakavyavahārāyeti phalitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:269: evaṃ kāraṇadravyasyaiva nānāvasthābhāktvena nānākāryātmakatvātkāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānanyatvamityāhamṛttiketyeva satyamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:275: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñopapādanārthaṃ pravṛttatvādasya vākyasyopādānopādeyayorananyatva eva tātparyamuktadiśā /
GSP33yasasi_u:277: tathā sati sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvādeva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ syādityasaṅgatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:283: nanu nirvikāratve kathamupādānatvam ? sarvacidaciccharīrakatvāt sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭatvenopādānatvaṃ brahmaṇa upapannameva /
GSP33yasasi_u:284: so 'yaṃ śarīrātmabhāvo jagadbrahmaṇoḥsadāyatanāḥ aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamiti nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:287: nanu cetanācetanaprapañcasya brahmānanyatvaṃ vā katham ? brahmātmakatvena brahmarūpatvenānanyatvopapatteḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:288: tadidameva prāmāṇikamiti cocyate etadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyamityekavākyatayānvayāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:290: paravyākhyācchāyayā tu tadbrahma satyaṃ sadaikarūpamityartho varṇitaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:296: pāpakādvyucca ritānāṃ visphuliṅgānāmagnyaṃśatvenāgnyananyatvavadbrahmaṇa udbhūtasya prapañcasyāpi brahmāṃśabhūtasya brahmānanyatvameva vivakṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:297: idaṃ cānanyatvaṃ mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca śrutiṣu nirūpitamiti yāvat // 30 //
GSP33yasasi_u:307: nanuuta tamādeśamaprākṣyoyenāśrataṃ śrutaṃ bhavatīti pratijñātamekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ brahmaṇa ekasyaiva pāramārthye ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:310: brahmaṇo nikhilajagadantarātmatvena nikhilajagatpradhānatayā nikhilasya ca taccharīratvena tatprakārataikasvarūpatayā tasmin jñāte tadanantargataṃ kimapi jñātavyaṃ mukhyaṃ nāvaśiṣyata iti ekavijñānena
GSP33yasasi_u:313: niruktārthaparaiḥ śrutivacanaistanmūlopabṛṃhaṇasmṛtivacanaiśca brahmātmakatvena labdhasvarūpaḥ prapañca ityeva bodhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:314: na tu brahmaṇo vibhūtibhūtaḥ sa niṣidhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:321: brahmāvibhūtibhūtasya prapañcasya na niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ śāstreṣviti nirūpitametāvatā // 32 //33
GSP33yasasi_u:325: prapañcaniṣedhe vivakṣite śāstravacanataḥ tattadarthaviśeṣapratipādanopādānādyarthāḥ sarve vyavahārā laukikā vaidikāśca lupyeran-aprāmāṇikā visaṃvādinaśca bhaveyuḥ, sarvasya mithyātvādityarthaḥ nanu bhedavyavahārāṇāmaprāmāṇikatvamiṣṭameveti cettatrāhatatheti /
GSP33yasasi_u:331: nanu paramārthadṛṣṭyā brahmabhinnasya sarvasya mithyātve 'pi tataḥ prāk avidyātaḥ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārādi nirūhyata iti cettatrāhavyāvahāriketi /
GSP33yasasi_u:333: vyāvahārikasattayā pramāṇaprameyavyavahāropapādane vyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvena śrutyādinā janitā parabrahmabuddhirapi bhavatabhimatā vyāvahārikārthamātragocarā bhavet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:336: etadviṣaye pūrvācāryaiḥ sūribhireva parākrāntaṃ nitarāmiti visamyate
GSP33yasasi_u:348: nanu sattve prapañcasya nāstīti pratyayaḥ katham /
GSP33yasasi_u:349: asattve vā kathaṃ tasminnastīti pratyayo bhavet // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:351: atha tasya sadasadanirvacanīyatvamapi parābhimataṃ nirasituṃ vicāramupakramate nanu sattve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:352: sattve prapañcasya nāstīti bādhaviṣayatvaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭatetyākṣepo mādhyamikādīnām /
GSP33yasasi_u:354: asattve sadbuddhibodhyatvaṃ pratipannaṃ tasya kathaṃ ghaṭeteti // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:368: sadasattvayoḥ pratīyayormadhye ekasyaiva nirṇaye hetvabhāvādyathāpratīti prapañcasyobhayamevaiṣṭavyamiti janā āsthitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:381: pratītibalātsattvāsattvarūpaviruddhadharmadvayāpattirūpasaṅkaṭe prasakte viruddhayoraikādhikaraṇyānupapattibalātsattvamasattvaṃ ca viruddhaṃ dharmadvayaṃ parityajya na sat nāpyasaditi sadasadanirvacaniyaṃ prapañca nirvacanti śāṅkarā ityarthaḥ // 41 //
GSP33yasasi_u:386: vibhaktadeśakālādiviśeṣataḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca pratītaṃ vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāderghaṭata eveti bhāvo 'mīṣām // 42 //
GSP33yasasi_u:393: tatra pakṣāntarāṇāṃ sadoṣatvapratipādanapūrvakaṃ sopādhikasattvāsattvapakṣo mīmāṃsakābhimato nirṇīyate sadyuktyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:403: ayamarthaḥ - ghaṭasvarūpe nāstitvaṃ pratīyamānameva, nāstītipratītireveti yāvat , yadyastitvamapi tasya pratyapādayiṣyat , yadvā pratītiḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca nirūpādhi yadi pratyapādayiṣyat , tarhi sadasattvasamuccayo 'bhyupāgaṃsyata /
GSP33yasasi_u:412: atra ca naiyāyikādimataṃ, tataḥ siddhānte viśeṣaśca śatadūṣaṇyāṃ vyavriyata ṣaṣṭitame vāde śrīmannigamāntācāryacaraṇaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:417: iha tādātmyaṃ saṃsargo vā sattvamiti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:419: ṣaṣṭhe tu pakṣe viruddhadharmayoga eva vastunyasadvyavahārahetutayā vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:420: ghaṭo hi ghaṭātmanā san paṭātmanā punarasanniti nirdiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:426: tathā ayaṃ paṭo nāstītyatra paṭatādātmyābhāvalakṣaṇā paṭātmanāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:427: tatra tadā ghaṭo nāstītyatra ca taddeśakālasaṃyogābhāvalakṣaṇāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:430: yathā ghaṭatvameva hi ayaṃ ghaṭo 'stītyatra pratītaṃ ghaṭasya sattvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:432: evaṃ svadeśakālasaṃbandhalakṣaṇā sattaivānyadeśakālanāstitāpratītāvapi viṣayo bhavati deśāntarādisaṃbandhābhāvatveneti
GSP33yasasi_u:433: tathā ca dharmaviśeṣa eva bhāvānāmastināstipratītigocara iti siddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:440: uktaṃ ca - ādāvante ca yannāsti nāsti madhye 'pi tattathā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:448: ataḥ sattvameva sadā mantavyaṃ bhāvānāmitisataḥ sattvaṃ sadā bhavedityantasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:451: asataḥ prayatnaśatenāpi niṣpattyā sattvaṃ durupapādaṃ sikatābhyastailasyeva /
GSP33yasasi_u:456: nanūpādānaviśeṣe kāryaviśeṣotpādanasāmarthyapratiniyamānnātiprasaṅga iti cenmaivam , kāryagarbhatvamantarā sāmarthyaniyamasyāpi durnirūpatvāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:475: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca kārakacakrasya tasya tasya tatra tatra kārye sāmarthyaniyamaḥ sidhyatīti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:487: tacca pratītibādhābhyāṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvasiddheḥ supratiṣṭhitamiti hi māyāvādināṃ matam
GSP33yasasi_u:492: nirviśeṣacinmātrabrahmātmaikyaṃ catattvamasivākyapratipannamiti vādamadvaitināṃ pratikṣeptuṃ tattvamasivākyārthavicāramupakramate śvetaketumiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:496: asyāpi samānādhikaraṇavākyasya mukhyārthatvaṃ tanmate na saṃbhavatītyahatasyetyādinā // 51
GSP33yasasi_u:504: samānavibhaktyā pratipannamaikyaṃ jīveśvarayorviruddhasvabhāvayorna ghaṭata iti mukhyārthāsaṃbhava evetyāśayaḥ // 52 //
GSP33yasasi_u:514: nanvajñatvādi sarvajñatvādi copalakṣaṇatayaivocyate, na tu viśeṣaṇatayā /
GSP33yasasi_u:518: upalakṣaṇatve 'pi ajñatvādinopalakṣyasya jīvabhāvasya sarvajñatvādinopalakṣyasyeśvarabhāvasya ca vaiyadhikaraṇyādeva
GSP33yasasi_u:523: cinmātre tu padadvayalakṣaṇopeyate, yathā so 'yaṃ raurityatra tattedantopalakṣite vastumātre lakṣaṇā padadvayasya tatheti śaṅkate vācyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:524: vācyaikadeśasya pravṛttinimittabhedasya tyāgena viśeṣyamātre cinmātre padadvayasya vṛttiḥ jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:533: tattāviśiṣṭe idantānvayasya bādhe 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇyubhayānvaye na
GSP33yasasi_u:537: prātipadikābhyāṃ deśadvayakāladvayasaṃbandhasya samānavibhaktyā tadāśrayadravyaikyasya ca pratipādane na virodhaleśo 'pi /
GSP33yasasi_u:542: na tvevaṃ bhavatā vaktuṃ śakyata ityāhasvaprakāśasyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:543: nirviśeṣe cinmātre viruddhadharmadvayasambandhasyāvirodhopapādakaṃ deśakālāvasthābhedādau kiñcidapi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:547: brahmaṇyavidyānvayāyogādevāvidyākṛtabhedadarśananirasanārthatvaṃ śāstrasya nirviśeṣacinmātra brahmātmaikyaviṣayatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ na saṃbhavītyāhanirdhūteti /
GSP33yasasi_u:550: na ca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe ca tatprasaktiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:556: mā ... pare ( māyopādhau pare )'dhyastāḥ śokamohadayaḥ punaḥ // 59 //
GSP33yasasi_u:559: cinmātre brahmaṇyavidyānvayānupapattiparyālocanayā kaiścidadvaitibhiḥ kalpitaṃ māyāvidyopādhibhedaṃ tata eveśeśitavyabhedaṃ cāparamārthamupapādyamānaṃ nirasyatieteneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:563: tattvamasivākyajanyaikyasākṣātkāreṇa māyāvidyopādhināśe tatkalpita īśajīvabhāvo 'pi nivṛtto nāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:571: kiñca māyāyā bhrāntijanakatve duḥkhādijanakatve cāvidyāto vibhāgāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:574: avidyāyā eva bahusaṃmatatvānmāyāvidyopādhibhedavādino 'mī kṣudrā brahmavido 'dvaitiṣviti ca bodhyam // 59 //60 //
GSP33yasasi_u:583: niraṃśe cinmātre māyāvidyāsambandhe tatprayuktasvabhāvabhedā ekasminneva prasajyante iti jīveśvarasvabhāvasāṅkaryaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:584: viśiṣṭe cet kiṃ tadviśeṣaṇam ? māyāvidyā ceti cedātmāśrayaḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:585: jīvatveśvaratve iti cedanyonyāśrayaḥ, anyattu viśeṣaṇaṃ durvacameva /
GSP33yasasi_u:586: kiñca māyayāvidyayā vā saṃvitsvarūpasya cchedāsambhavādekameva tattadupahitaṃ bhavedgaganamiva maṭhāntavartighaṭena maṭhena copahitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:587: tathā ca hastapādādyavacchinnasukhaduḥkhabhoga ekasyaiva yathā jīvasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:588: tathā tattadupādhiprayuktaiśvaryaduḥkhādibhoga ekasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata iti jīvaparasvabhāvāvyavasthitirevetyarthaḥ taṭasthāvasthitā dharmāḥ svarūpaṃ na spṛśanti kim /
GSP33yasasi_u:592: tanniṣṭhasya sārvajñyāderajñatvādeśca daṇḍena kuṇḍalena vopahite kādācitkadaṇḍādiviśeṣaṇavattayā taṭasthaśabdite devadatte vartamānasya sukhasya duḥkhasya ca devadattātmanīva brahmaṇi sambandho durvāra eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:607: brahmabhinnasyānātmatve tattvaṃpadadvayalakṣyārtha eka pratyaktatvaṃ cinmātramava śiṣyate
GSP33yasasi_u:610: taccaekaśeṣe tu tādātmyaṃ cinmātre naiva sambhavet iti syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:616: atra yādavaprakāśaprakriyayā bhāṭṭaprakriyayā vā nirūpyate tādātmyamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:618: dharmadvārakabhedaviśiṣṭasvarūpābheda eva ca tādātmyaṃ matamiti vivekaḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:628: antye ghaṭo ghaṭa itīti vā bhedābhedavikalpo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:629: abhedābhedinaḥ-bhedābhedibhinnasya, atyantabhinnasyātyantābhinnasya vā bandhe - tādātmyasambandhe asati-aprāmāṇike sati bhavatkṛto 'yaṃ vikalpo
GSP33yasasi_u:631: na hi ghaṭo ghaṭa iti vā ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yasasi_u:635: na ca bhede tayorvirodhādekatra samāveśo na ghaṭata iti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:637: dharmato bhedaḥ svarūpato 'bheda iti vāvirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 66 //
GSP33yasasi_u:645: etayoḥ-bhedābhedayoḥ svarūpaṃ svarūpabhedamupagamyaiva bhedo 'bhedo veti vikalpakoṭyorbādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:655: antye asambaddhasya viśiṣṭabuddhinirvāhakatvaṃ tasya na syāditi vikalpanamapi kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātraphalakaṃ pratyakṣānubhavabādhitaṃ cetyarthaḥ // 69 //
GSP33yasasi_u:659: nīlarūpavati ghaṭādau nīlabuddhiryathā nīlasamavāyāvagāhinī viditā nāpalapyā, evaṃ nīlamutpalamiti viditāprasiddhā nīlatādātmyamatirapi nāpalapyā /
GSP33yasasi_u:672: sphuṭapratipanne saṃyoge dustarkatanmūlavikalpanādi yathā bhramalakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātram , pratyakṣaparāhataṃ ca ; evaṃ nīlotpalāditādātmye pratyakṣe jīvabrahmatādātmye ca śāstrasiddhe dustarkavikalpanādi pratyakṣaśāstradaṇḍanivāritamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:677: pravṛttinimittarūpadharmabhedena dharmisvarūpābhedena ca tādātmyaṃ tattvamasītyādau tvamādiśabdānāṃ tattaccharīrakabrahmaparyantatayā nirūpaṇīyam , tadādipadānāṃ brahmātmakaparatayā vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:681: ekaśeṣe hi ciddhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalaṃ bhavet // 74 //
GSP33yasasi_u:682: ( iti paramate sāmānādhikaraṇyārthāyogavarṇanam ) etāvatā paramate prātipadikayoriva samānavibhakterapi na mukhyārthateti vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:684: tathāpi pravṛttinimittadharmabhedaprahāṇānna sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatā paramata iti bodhyam
GSP33yasasi_u:687: eṣa brahma praviṣṭo 'smi grīṣme śītamiva hradam itivacanānusāreṇa brahmānandasya hradatvarūpaṇam
GSP33yasasi_u:689: brahmānandaṃ hṛdantaḥstha iti pūrvamudritapāṭhastu na samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:691: paramaphale mokṣe bhoktṛtvāvasthāpannasya svasya vilayaṃ cejjānīyānnābhilaṣyettāmityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:692: ekaśeṣe-nirviśeṣacinmā trapariśeṣe, kasya-brahmaṇo jīvasya vā mokṣaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:693: phalam ? na brahmaṇaḥ, nityamuktatvāt , nāpi jīvasya, tasyaiva tadā vilayāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:694: cinmātrameva brahma jīvasya svarūpamiti cettarhi brahmaṇa evāvidyājīvabhāvādi vaktavyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:699: na hi tasyāmajātāyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ vākhilaṃ jagat /
GSP33yasasi_u:714: ghaṭādayo hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt // 77 //
GSP33yasasi_u:716: naivaṃ, ghaṭo hi nābhāti sā sphuratyeva tu sphuṭam // 78 //
GSP33yasasi_u:726: ghaṭabuddhiḥ paṭajñānakāle na bhāsate, kintu paṭadhīreveti cet , maivam /
GSP33yasasi_u:733: tasyātiriktatve tu paṭajñāne tadabhāne 'pi saṃvidobhānamakṣatameveti samuditāśayaḥ // 77 //78 kiñcāsyāḥ svaprakāśāyā nīrūpāyā na hi svataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:741: saṃvinna nānā svaprakāśatvāt , yannānā tadasvaprakāśaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:744: na vastu vastudharmo vā na pratyakṣo na laiṅgikaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:755: evaṃ ghaṭasya paṭabhedo dharmaḥ, paṭabhedabhedo 'pi tathā, evaṃ tadbhedo 'pīti cānavasthāprasakteḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:757: yathā-pratyakṣaṃ tāvanna bhedagrāhi, kṣaṇikasya tasya svarūpapratiyogigrahaṇapūrvakabhedagrahaṇaparyantāvasthānābhāvādviramya vyāpārāyogācca /
GSP33yasasi_u:759: pratyakṣeṇa bhedagrahaṇābhāvādeva tanmūlāvinābhāvagrahādhīnodayamanumānamapi na bhede pramāṇaṃ bhavediti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:760: nanu tarhi bhedagrahaḥ katham ? tatrāhakevalaṃ bhramalakṣaṇa iti // 81 //
GSP33yasasi_u:769: kiñca svayaṃprakāśasya svato vā parato 'pi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:775: saṃvidaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo vā kiṃ tayaiva gṛhyate ? uta saṃvidantareṇeti vikalpya prathamaṃ kalpa pratikṣipatisvata iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:776: svena satā svābhāvo gṛhyata ? utāsatā ? ādyandūṣayatisvasminniti /
GSP33yasasi_u:794: yato nirbhedatvaṃ saṃvidaḥ, ataḥ kiṃ ghaṭasaṃvidadhiṣṭhānamāhosvitpaṭa-
GSP33yasasi_u:795: saṃvidityādivikalpajalpanaṃ yat , so 'yaṃ saṃvidbhedāvalambī vikalpādivādaḥ saṃvitsvarūpayāthātmyājñānakārya ityadvaitino manyanta ityarthaḥ // 86 //
GSP33yasasi_u:802: yuktivimarśakā vayaṃ tu nātra bhavadīye brahmopadeśe śraddhālavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:803: ato 'smān rañjayituṃ satpramāṇatarkā evopādeyāḥ, na tu śuṣkopadeśā iti bhāvaḥ // 87 //
GSP33yasasi_u:807: puruṣabhedena, ekasminnapi puruṣe viṣayabhedena, ekasminneva viṣaye kālabhedena karaṇabhedena ca dhiyo nānā pratyātmamadhyakṣasiddhāḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:812: na hi bhedaḥ svato nāsti nāpratyakṣaśca sammataḥ // 89 //
GSP33yasasi_u:813: nanu yathā nirbhede 'pyākāśe sambandhivyaṅgyo bhedo ghaṭākāśo 'yamayaṃ tu maṭhākāśa iti pratīyate, evaṃ saṃvidyapi viṣayāśrayavyaṅgyo bhedo na vāstava iti cettatrāhasambandhīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:814: yathā bhūtalaghaṭasaṃyogo 'yam , sa tu kuḍyamusalasaṃyoga iti sambandhibhedenaiva vyāvṛttatayā pratīyamānaḥ saṃyogabhedo vāstava eva
GSP33yasasi_u:815: sambandhijanyatvāttasya, yathā vā caitrasya ghaṭecchā, maitrasya paṭecchetyevaṃ sambandhibhedena bhinnatayā pratīyamānā bhinnabhinnaivecchā
GSP33yasasi_u:816: tattatpuruṣīyā tadā tadā jāyamānā, evaṃ viṣayāśrayabhedena pratīyamīnaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:817: saṃvidbhedo 'pi vāstavika eva kālādibhedena jāyamāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:822: tataḥ sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāt , na vā kiñcitkadācana // 90 //
GSP33yasasi_u:824: nityavibhunaḥ prakāśakasyaikasya jñānasya sarvaviṣayasambandhe samāne sadā sarvārthasya bhānaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:825: prakāśakajñānasambandhe 'pyabhāne tu kasyacidapi kadāpi bhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:833: siddhānte tu saṅkocavikāsābhyāṃ jñānasya viṣayabhede sannidhyasannidhī vyavasthite iti bodhyam nāpi kāraṇabhedena, nityāyāstadabhāvataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:835: etatkaraṇajanyaṃ jñānametamevārthaṃ gṛhṇātītyevaṃ karaṇabhedenāpi vyavasthā durvacā bhavadbhirityāhanāpīti
GSP33yasasi_u:843: cakṣurādiprasṛtayā'ntarakaraṇavṛttyā viṣayasambaddhayāvidyāvaraṇanivartana eva caitanyaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ prakāśayatīti vyavasthā ghaṭata iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:848: nanu naḥ saṃvido bhinnaṃ sarvaṃ nāma na kiñcana /
GSP33yasasi_u:850: sarvasya sarvadā bhānaprasaṅgaṃ siddhāntinodbhāvitamākṣipati paraḥnanu iti
GSP33yasasi_u:851: saṃvidbhinnasya sarvasya virahādevāsmanmate sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāditya
GSP33yasasi_u:853: idamākhyāhi bhoḥ kiṃ nu nīlādirna prakāśate /
GSP33yasasi_u:854: prakāśamāno nīlādiḥ saṃvido vā na bhidyate // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:856: kiṃ nīlādipratītireva nāstītyucyate, uta nīlādeḥ saṃvidabhinnatvena
GSP33yasasi_u:861: nānāpratītinihnive nānāpadapadārthapratītinirvāhyaḥ sarvo laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāraḥ pratītisubhagaḥ-abādhitānubhavasiddhaḥ samyaṅ nirvyūḍho bhavedbhavadbhirityupālambhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:873: bhinnatvenābhinnatvena vā nirūpayitumaśakyatvaṃ ca tasyā avidyāvilāsatvāt bhedābhedayoranirūpaṇaṃ yasyā bhedābhedānirūpaṇā /
GSP33yasasi_u:874: āvidyāsya nīlādibhedasya mithyātvāt mithyārthe ca durghaṭatvasya bhūṣaṇatvādbhedābhedānirūpaṇopapattiḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:875: upapattyananuvartitvādeva ca sarvaṃ sadā bhāyādityādyāpatterapyanavakāśa iti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:879: avidyā hi nyāyānalaspṛṣṭā jātuṣavanna jīvituṃ prabhavati /
GSP33yasasi_u:887: atra vikalpaḥ-kiṃ vidyābhāvo 'vidyā, uta vidyābhinnaṃ bhāvāntaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:890: tathā ca svayamevālabdhasattāvidyā kathaṃ prapañcavyavasthāpikā bhavedityākūtam /
GSP33yasasi_u:896: arthānarthāntaratvādivikalpo 'syā na yujyataiti vacanaṃvidyātor'thāntaramasāviti ca vacanaṃ mitho viruddhamiti yāvat // 99
GSP33yasasi_u:901: kiñca śuddhājaḍā saṃvit , avidyeyaṃ tu nedṛśī /
GSP33yasasi_u:904: tathā ca śuddhājaḍasaṃvidapekṣayā vikārāspadāśuddhajaḍāvidyāyā bheda eva paramārthataḥ kuto na nirūpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:905: tathā ca paramārthāvidyāvilāso bhedaḥ sarvo 'pi saṃvida ekasyā eva
GSP33yasasi_u:906: sakalārthaprakāśakatve sarvadā bhāseteti doṣastadavastha iti bhāvaḥ // 102
GSP33yasasi_u:908: sā vidyā kiṃ nu saṃvittirvedyaṃ vā veditāthavā // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:911: tatra pratiyogibhūtā vidyā kiṃrūpeti vikalpanaṃ vimarśanārtham // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:915: tatra vidyāyā vedyarūpatve veditṛsvarūpatve vā doṣamāhavedyatve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:920: kiñceyaṃ tadviruddhā vā, na tasyāḥ kvāpi sambhavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:923: divākarakaravyāpte deśe divākare vā tadvirodhino 'ndhatamasasyeva vibhvyā saṃvidā vyāpte sarvatra saṃvidi vā nāvidyāyāḥ samāveśasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:929: saṃvidabhāvādirūpānādiravidyāsti cet , saṃvidevaikāstīti bhavadabhimatamadvaitaṃ na sidhyediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:931: avidyāyā aparamārthatvena tadanāditve 'pi nāsmadabhimatādvaitoparodha iti cedatra bramaḥ-anāditvenopagamyamānāyā avidyāyāḥ kalpakadoṣāntarāyogenāpāramārthyāyogaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:932: brahmaṇa eva tatkalpakadoṣatve durghaṭatvena hetvantarānapekṣatve vā muktāvapi tatprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:935: kiñcāsau kasya ? jīvasya, ko jīvo yasya seti cet /
GSP33yasasi_u:937: na te jīvādavidyā syāt , na ca jīvastayā vinā /
GSP33yasasi_u:940: na vidyate samādhānaṃ yasya tadasamādhānam - asamādheyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:941: avidyākalpito jīvabhāvaḥ, tasmin siddha evāvidyāsiddhiriti jīvāvidyāpakṣe paramate 'nyonyāśrayo 'samādheyaḥ prasajatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:943: kintu bhavatāmeveti dyotyate te iti nirdeśena /
GSP33yasasi_u:946: bījāṅkura nyāyena sa doṣaḥ parihārya ityatrāhane ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:950: brahmaṇaścenna sarvajñaṃ kathaṃ tat baṃbhramīti te(bhoḥ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:955: sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvathā yathāvasthitaṃ svataḥ sākṣātkurvatastasya nānāvidhabhrāntilakṣaṇāvidyāśrayatvaṃ viruddhatvānna sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:956: brahma bambhramītīti te 'bhimataṃ kathaṃ ghaṭate ? tasya sarvajñatvena bhramāyogāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:960: avidyāmūlāhaṅkāranibandhanatā ca brahmaniṣṭhasya sārvajñyasya na ghaṭate,parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ceti tasyānanyopādhikatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:978: vibhinnavibhinnavidheyakatvena bhedavyavasthāpakāḥ bhedakapramāṇabhūtāstāntrikairmatāḥ, tanmūlā vidheyabhedapratyayāśca yathārthā eva yathā ; tathā sarvajñatāpi pāramārthikārthabhedagocarā
GSP33yasasi_u:982: parabrahmaṇi parameśvare svataḥ sarvajñe 'vidyāyā asambhava uktaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:984: nityamuktasvabhāvatvātsarvajñatvācca bandhakāvidyāpratibhaṭe sarveśvara eva yadyavidyā vindeta padaṃ gabhastimālinīvāndhatamasaṃ tarhi na tasyā nivartakamanyatkiñcidapi sambhavedityanivṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:985: nanu tattvamasītivākyajanyāparokṣacinmātrabrahmātmaikyasākṣātkāreṇaivāvidyānivṛttiriti cet , naitatsādhu, vākyasyāparokṣajanakatvābhāvāt , śukādeḥ sākṣātkāreṇaivāvidyānivṛtteḥ saṃsāropalambhavirodhāt , ekajīvavādasya ca nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:986: kiñca brahma svāvidyayā bambhramīti, jīvaḥ svavidyayā tadunmocayatīti
GSP33yasasi_u:989: tathā cāmananti sma parāśarabhaṭṭapādāḥetadrāmāstraṃ dalayatu kalibrahmamīmāṃsakāṃśca jñaptirbrahmaitajjavaladapi nijāvidyayā bambhramīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:990: tasya bhrāntiṃ tāṃ ślathayati jitādvaitavidyastu jīvo yadyaddṛśyaṃ tadvitathamiti ye jñāpayāñcakrurajñāḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:994: nanu bhedakapramāṇānāṃ sarvajñatvādivacanānāmapi vyāvahārikārthabhedagocarāṇāṃ vyāvahārikameva pramāṇyam /

GSP33yasasi_u:1015: saditi sattāmātramekarasaṃ svaprakāśarūpaṃ brahma kathaṃ svaviṣayakāvidyāyatanaṃ bhavedākārabhedābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1017: sanmātrameva brahma svaprakāśatvarūpeṇāhantvarūpeṇa vā pratyaktvenāśrayo 'vidyāyāḥ, brahmatvena viṣaya iti cedayaṃ rūpabhedaḥ kathamāyātastatra ?
GSP33yasasi_u:1019: svābhāviko 'yamiti tu na vaktuṃ śakyate saviśeṣatvabhiyā parairiti bhāvaḥ jīvāvidyāpakṣa ivātrāpyanyonyāśra iti punarityanena dyotyate // 114 //115

GSP33yasasi_u:1045: yathāmati pūritaṃ śodhitaṃ cāsmābhirmūla eva ( ) cihnamadhye pradarśitamityanusandheyam // kiñca prapañcanirvāhajananī yeyamāśritā /

GSP33yasasi_u:1049: avidyā ekā, utāho anekā, tadāśrayo jāvo 'pyeko 'neko veti vikalpaḥ // 122
GSP33yasasi_u:1054: śuko mukto, vāmadevo mukta iti khalu śrautīprasiddhiḥ /

GSP33yasasi_u:1057: bādhitaṃ hi svayameva nivartsyati kañcitkālamanuvartamānamapīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1073: pratyūhatāmiti pāṭhe tadvacanaṃ karma, svāpnamuktyuktiyuktibalena siddhaṃ pratyanumānaṃ pratyūhatāṃ bādhatāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1082: svāvidyāparikalpitatvaṃ tava prapañcasya ca sādhayannanyastulyanayena tvayā kathaṃ pratikṣepya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1085: sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1086: ubhau ca yadi sarvajñau buddhibhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1087: iti nyāyena parasparavirodhādubhayamapi paramārthato na sidhyatīti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1088: yadvā sarveṣāṃ jñānā jīvānāmaikyasya siddhirivānyasya sarvasyaikāvidyākalpitatvasyāpi siddhirna setsyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1093: tvamanyān bādhase tvadīyān , tvāṃ cānye tvadīyā eveti sundopasundanyāyaparāhataṃ yuṣmanmatamiti bhāvaḥ // 129 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1095: tathaiva bhavato 'pīti vyartho mokṣāya te śramaḥ // 130 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1106: yathādhyātmavidyayā śukādīnāṃ bhūtaiva muktirabhūtetyucyate, tathā bhavatāṃ tataḥ paścādbhāvinyapi sā mithyā, na bhāvinyeva vastuta
GSP33yasasi_u:1127: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadyapi muktirnityasiddhā brahmavidyayā notpādyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:1130: sthitasyābhivyaktyarthaḥ prayatno yathā loke saphalo dṛṣṭastatheti // 135
GSP33yasasi_u:1133: saṃvit kiṃ saiva kiṃ vāhaṃ brahmāsmītīti kīdṛśī /
GSP33yasasi_u:1134: yadi svarūpasaṃvit sā, nityaiveti na tatphalam // 139 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1142: iti kīdṛśī-ityevaṃ jijñāsitaprakārābrahmāsmītīti vṛttidhīriti vā pāṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1146: nanu te brahmavidyā sā saiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ katham // 140 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1149: na hi brahmavidyāsādhyaṃ prakāśāntaraṃ muktau bhavateṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1155: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktātmasvabhāvasyābhivyaktirvṛttirūpā cettasyā utpādavināśayogitvāttannivṛttau punaravidyā samunmiṣediti saṃsṛtibhayānativṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1156: nanu pūrvāvidyāṃ vināśya vidyā svayamapi naśyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1157: avidyānivṛttyā ca na punarbhavaprasaṅga iti cet ; atra brūmaḥ -
GSP33yasasi_u:1159: sāvaśeṣocchede tu sūkṣmarūpeṇāvasthitāyāstasyā abhivyakternivṛttau punaḥ sthūlatayonmeṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1160: na cānādibhāvarūpāyā api mithyātvādeva ātyantikocchedaḥ kriyate vidyayeti vācyam , tanmithyātva eva vigānāt ; yukterābhāsatvācchāstrasya cānyaparyāyāditi dikū // 141 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1162: kāryaṃ na jāyate yena tamāhuḥ pratibandhakam // 142 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1173: saṃsāriṇaśca viṣayaprāvaṇyadasāyāṃ tattvasākṣātkārapuṣkalakāraṇasampattetevāsiddhyā tadanudaya iti na tatrāpi pratibandhakatvaṃ tasyā ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1175: siddhānte tu vidyāprāgabhāvarūpāyā avidyāyā na vidyāpratibandhakatvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1177: vidyāmāhātmyācca bandhakakarmanivṛttau karmaṇā saṅkucitaprasaraṇasya svābhāvikamasaṅkucitaṃ prasaraṇaṃ dharmabhūtajñānasya sadā muktāviti viśeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1184: brahmasvarūpabhinnatve viśadaprakāśasya brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaprasaṅgāttadabhinnatve vācye 'nutpādyatvādeva tasya tatpratirodhakatvāyogānnādyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1186: vaiśadyameva nivartate, prakāśastvanuvartata iti ca nirviśeṣavādinā vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1187: kiñca viśadaprakāśapratirodhikāyāṃ satyāmavidyāyāṃ kathaṃ sākṣātkāro bhavet ? so
GSP33yasasi_u:1190: kiñcāvidyānivṛttyanantarabāvino viśadānubhavasya prāgasattve mukteranityatvam , sattve ca saṃsārānupapattiḥ saṃsārānupapattiḥ prasajyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1191: naca nivṛttāvidyatvameva svarūpaprakāśasya svarūpaprakāśasya vaiśadyamiti vācyam , svaprakāśamātravapuṣi sadā vidyotamāne nirviśeṣe cinmātre brahmaṇi avidyānvayāyogātpragapi vaiśadyasyaivopagantavyatvāt durghaṭatvāttatra padamañcatyavidyeti cettarhi tata eva muktāvapyavidyānvayaprasaktiriti muktasyāpi bhayaṃ bhavedeveti // 142
GSP33yasasi_u:1198: tathā ca mithyābhūtasyaikasyānekasya vā jīvasyopagame na viśeṣo vinābhiniveśādityarthaḥ // prātibhāsikamekatvaṃ pratibhāsaparāhatam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1200: eko jīva iti kimekasyaiva pratibhāsādupagamyate, āhosvinnānātvena bhāsamānasyāpi tasya yuktyaikatvaṃ niṣkṛṣyata iti vikalpamabhipretyādyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayatiprādibhāsikamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1204: nānājīvabhānasya na vyavahāhakāla eva bādhyatvaṃ śuktirūpyāderivetyāhaāsaṃsāreti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1208: pāścātyabādhānniścīyate vyavahāradaśāyāmeva, naivaṃ tadaiva jīvabhedaprayuktavyavahārabhedānāṃ bādho niścitaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1209: kintvanyajīvakṛtasyopakārasyāpakārasya vā sattvapratītyaiva āprājñādābālagopālaṃ tadanuguṇapravṛttisaṃrambho dṛśyate 'nuvartamāna
GSP33yasasi_u:1211: vyavahārakāle 'bādhyatvācca jīvabhedasya vyāvahārikatvameva paraprakriyayāpi, na prātibhāsikatvam
GSP33yasasi_u:1219: sarve jīvā ahameva jīvatvādahamiva, sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi mayaivātmavanti
GSP33yasasi_u:1223: tattaddehagatavilakṣaṇapravṛttibhedānumitāḥ tattadanuguṇaviruddhajñānasaṅkalpaprayatnavanto 'nye dehino 'pi sa sa svātmeva svaśarīrapravṛttyanuguṇajñānādimān pratyātmasiddho na nihnotu śakyante ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1228: svāsamavetatvaṃ ca tasya svasya tadā bhinnasaṅkalpapravṛttimattvādeva suniśceyamiti bodhyam yathānumeyādvahnyādera(rā)numānā vilakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1229: pratyakṣaṃ te (kṣyante)tathānyebhyo jīvebhyo na pṛthak katham // 150 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1233: tathānumeyebhyaḥ paradehasthātmabhyaḥ śarīrapravṛtticetanasahkalpaprayatnapūrvakatvavyāptigrahakāle gṛhītaṃ tvadīyātmasvarūpaṃ tvaccharīrapravṛttihetusaṅkalpādimadbhinnatvena kuto na pratyakṣam ? api tu pratyakṣameveti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1239: paradeheṣu parātmanaśceṣṭāviśeṣairanukūlapratikūlodāsīnānūhitvaiva hi tattadanuguṇā vyavahārāḥ dṛṣṭā loke, jīvabhedaprayuktā eva cādhikāryanadhikārivibhāgādivyavahārāḥ śāstrīyā dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmuparodhaḥ prasajyate jīvabhedānupagama iti bhāvaḥ // 151 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1247: tathā ca pāde me vedanā, śirasi sukhamityādipratisandhānānupattiriti yāvat
GSP33yasasi_u:1254: na ca śarīrabhedasyai vātmabhedakatvam , nanu karacaraṇādibhedasyeti vācyam , saubharyādau śarīrabhede 'pi pratisandhānasya dṛṣṭatvāttasyāpi bhedakatvāyogāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1257: natvasmadādestatheti vācyam , aupādhikātmabhedavāde pratikarmavyavasthāyā api durghaṭatvāt ; upādhestadīyatvaṃ tatkarmaṇā, upādhivyavasthayaiva ca tatkarmavyavasthitiriti parasparāśrayācceti dik /
GSP33yasasi_u:1264: janmabhede ca maraṇanarakagarbhavāsajanmakālaprabhavakleśabāhulyena saṃskāravināśātpūrvajanmānubhūtasmaraṇaṃ janmāntare ca jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1266: jīvanādṛṣṭabalāttu saṃskāraviśeṣasyāvinaṣṭatvaṃ jātamātra udbhūtatvaṃ ca kalpyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1271: ekakṣaṇa eva jāyamāneṣu nānāsukhaduḥkhānubhaveṣu kāladairghyādisaṃskārapramoṣakavirahe 'pi asmaraṇādi ātmanāmasaṅkarāt anakyādeva vyavasthāpyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1272: tathā caikātmyadhiyo bhrāntirūpāyā api nodayāvasaraḥ, ātmabhedasyaiva sphuṭapratibhānāditibhāvaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1280: te ca svasvāvidyākalpitaṃ padārthajātaṃ paśyanti pṛthak pṛthak svapna iva
GSP33yasasi_u:1281: vyāvahārikā anye jīvā anyena na jñāyante /
GSP33yasasi_u:1283: atra cānyaṃ jīvaṃ tadguṇadoṣādi vā vyāvahārikamanyo jīvastathābhūto na jānāti cettarhi tatsamāgamādiprasaṅgābhāvāt
GSP33yasasi_u:1289: tatra ca doṣa ukta eveti hārdam // 156 //157 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1292: saṃvinmātre 'vidyākalpito meyamātṛbheda iti paramataṃ vistareṇa pratikṣiptametāvatā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1295: bhavadabhimataireva dharmaiḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ saṃvidaḥ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1296: saṃvideva na te dharmāḥ, siddhāyāmapi saṃvidi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1298: svarūpābhedātteṣāṃ na saṃvidaḥ sadharmatvamiti śaṅkāmanūdya nirācaṣṭesaṃvideveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1299: sampratipanne 'pi saṃvitsvarūpe tannityatvavibhutvaikatvasvaprakāśatvādau bauddhanaiyāyikamīmāṃsakādīnāṃ vivādāt svarūpabhedācca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃvitto na saṃpratipannasaṃvidabhinnatvaṃ teṣāṃ yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1303: nanvevamapi teṣāmaparamārthatvātparamārthadvitīyarāhityaṃ surakṣitameveti cettatrāhana ca te iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1304: tavāpi tattvedamparaśrutyantasiddhāste dharmāssaṃvido nityatvādaya ityeva matam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1306: teṣāṃ bādhe tulyanayena saṃvido 'pi bādhaḥ syāditi dyotyate
GSP33yasasi_u:1317: athavā tasya te, yadvā ta eva brahmasaṃjñinaḥ // 162 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1320: āhosvitteṣāmeva pratyekaṃ brahmasaṃjñā, samuditānāṃ veti vikalpaḥ // 162
GSP33yasasi_u:1328: na hi ghaṭaḥ kalaśa iti sahapāṭhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1330: dvitīye kalpe tu brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaprasaṅga ityāhadvitīyaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1335: pratyekaśo brahmatvamityatra nānā brahma prasajyate satyaṃ brahma, jñānaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1336: brahma, anantaṃ brahma, ānando brahmeti ; khaṇḍo muṇḍaḥ pūrṇaśṛṅgogaurityatrevetyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1340: taruvṛndasya vanatvavatsatyādisamudāyasya brahmatve, samudāyasya samudāyyananyatve pratyekapakṣoktadūṣaṇānativṛttiḥ, atiriktatve sāṃśatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ ca prasajyate brahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ // 165 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1342: tena na kvāpi vākyārtho vibhāgo 'sti nidarśanam // 166 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1343: nanu satyādivākyamakhaṇḍārthaparaṃ svarūpalakṣaṇavākyatvāt , divā divi prakṛṣṭaprakāśaḥ sūryaḥ, niśi ca tathābhūtaścandra itivaditi nirviśeṣabrahmasiddhirityatrāhaprakarṣaśceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1357: apohāḥ kiṃ na santyeva, santo vā, nobhaye 'pi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1360: nobhaye-na santo nāpyasantaḥ, sadasadvilakṣaṇā iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1362: apohānāṃ sattve taiḥ sataḥ sadvitīyatā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1368: tathātve ca ghaṭādibhyo brahmāpi na viśiṣyate // 169 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1370: sadvyatireke 'sattvam , asadvyatireke ca sattvaṃ vyavasthitamiti sadasadbhinnatvaṃ kasyāpi na sambhavatīti pūrvamevoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1372: apohānāṃ brahmasvarūpatve sadasadvilakṣaṇatve ca brahmaṇaḥ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvaṃ prasajyate prapañcasyeveti bhāvaḥ // 169 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1376: jaḍādivyāvartakadharmabodhanamantarā jaḍādivyāvṛttirna pratipādayituṃ śakyate satyādipadairjaḍādiparyāyapadairiveti vyāvartakadharmabodhakatvamavarjanīyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1381: ( iti saviśeṣatvopapādanena saṃvido nirviśeṣatvanirasanam ) nanu vyāvartakadharmavattvaṃ na bodhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1384: yogye pratiyoginyanupalabhyamāne 'dhikaraṇamātrajñānameva tadabhāva iti jñānaviśeṣarūpatvādabhāvasya jñānaviśeṣarūpaiḥ satyādipadalakṣyārthairabhāvairbhāvarūpaiḥ saviśeṣatā brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1387: yogye pratiyoginyanupalabhyamāne tatrādhikaraṇe yadbhāvāntaramupalabhyate tadeva pratiyogivyapekṣayābhāvavyapadeśabhāgiti adhikaraṇavṛttidharmāntararūpatvādabhāvānāṃ taiḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1389: dharmasya tu svaparanirvāhakatvena svarūpamevābhāvaḥ, sati sambhave dharmāntaraṃ veti yathopalambhaṃ vyavasthā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1390: yasmin pratīyamāne itarāropo na ghaṭate, tasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1391: satsvarūpe pratīyamāna eva bhedānāmadhyāsācca tatra tasyaiva netarābhāvarūpatvaṃ sambhavi
GSP33yasasi_u:1393: avidyānivṛtau viśadaṃ bhāsamāne tu na sa iti viśadasvarūpasyābhāvarūpatvaṃ sambhavatīti vācyam
GSP33yasasi_u:1395: svarūpātiriktatve tu tasyaivābhāvarūpatvaṃ na svarūpasyeti prasaṅgāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1396: kiñca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe vastuni viśādāviśadabhānameva durvacam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1397: saviśeṣe tu katipayākāreṇa bhānamaviśadam , sarvākārabhānaṃ viśadamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1398: kiñca brahmaṇo dravyatve sadharmakatvam , adravyatve tu kasyaciddharmarūpatvaṃ prasajyate
GSP33yasasi_u:1406: vyavacchindanti jāyanta iti yā (tā) vat svasākṣikam // 173 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1407: atha prapañcasyāpi prasaṅgātsadasadanirvacanīyatvaṃ paramataṃ nirasyati bhūte tyādinā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1409: svasvaprameyaṃ yathāyathaṃ tattadasādhāraṇākārato vijātīyasajātīyāntaravyattamavagamayanti pratyakṣādīnīti prasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:1410: tadasādhāraṇākāreṇa sadbhāva eva vastūnāṃ pramāṇānitāni , na tu sadasadanirvacanīyatva iti bhāvaḥ // 172 // 173 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1411: yathāgrataḥ sthite nīle nīlimānyakathā na, dhīḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1412: ekākārā , na hi tathā sphaṭike dhavake matiḥ // 174 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1416: nīle nīlamatiḥ , sphaṭike dhavalamatiśca naikaviṣayā , kintu parasparavyāvṛttaguṇaviṣayaiva ; tathā kṣīre madhuradhīḥ , nimbe kaṣāyadhīśca /
GSP33yasasi_u:1423: tattadvastvasādhāraṇākārabhede 'bādhitapratītimuktvā vyavahāramapi tādṛśamupanyasyati pramāṇatayā vyavahārā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1425: satyaṃ pratītirastyasyā mūlaṃ nāstīti cenna tat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1426: sā cedasti tasyā mūlaṃ kalpyatāṃ kāryabhūtayā // 176 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1430: kāryabalāttadanuguṇaṃ mūlamabādhitapratītīnāṃ yathārthyavyavasthāpakamanumīyatāmiti bhāvaḥ kḷptaṃ cendriyaliṅgādi tadbhāvānuvidhānataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1432: aikyāyogācca bhedo na pratyakṣa iti yo bhramaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1434: aduṣṭendriyādereva mitiyāthārthye hetutvamanvayavyatirekasiddhaṃ nāpalapyaṃ cetyāha kḷpta miti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1435: vastubhedo nirduṣṭendriyarūpeṇa pratyakṣapramāṇenaiva gṛhyate iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1441: prathamamadhikaraṇasvarūpaṃ gṛhītvāthaṃ bhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti kramo 'pi na sambhavati , pramiteḥ kṣaṇikatvādviramya vyāpārāyogādvā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1443: ataḥ svarūpagrahasyaiva pratyakṣapramitirūpatvam , bhedagrahasya tu bhrāntilakṣaṇatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1448: tayoḥ svarūpayāthātmyājñānaprayukto niruktavidhaḥ pareṣāṃ bhrama ityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1454: , yathā kambugrīvādimattvameva ghaṭasya paṭādbheda iti bhāvaḥ // 179 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1458: yathā bhūtalasvarūpajñānameva ghaṭādyanupalambhe sati tattatsmaraṇasahakāri ghaṭādiśūnyatāvyavahārasādhanaṃ matamabhāvasyādhikaraṇasvarūpatvavādināṃ tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1460: ekasyaiva pritayogibhedena nānāvyavahārasādhanatvaṃ nidarśanamukhena draḍhayati hrasve ti
GSP33yasasi_u:1461: ekatraiva ṣaḍaṅgulimite vastuni tadapekṣayādīrghaṃ pādarthāntaramapekṣya hrasvavyavahāraṃ hrasvaṃ tadapekṣya dīrghavyavahāraṃ ca tadvastujñānameva tattatpratiyogismaraṇasahakāreṇa janayati hīti bhāvaḥ // 180 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1465: svarūpalakṣaṇasya bhedasyādyakṣaṇa eva dharmigrahaṇe grahasambhavādbhedavyavahāra eva pratiyogismaraṇasyāpekṣitatvācca nānākāravibhinnapadārthasvarūpasya tattvaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapramitaṃ nāpalapanārhamiti bhāvaḥ asādhāraṇākārarūpasya bhedasya svaparanirvāhakatvānnānavasthā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1471: eṣāṃ ca tattatpratiyogyuparaktatvena vyavahāre punastattatpratiyogismaraṇāpekṣeti viveko 'tra bodhyaḥ // 181 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1474: evaṃ bhedaprapañcasya sattva eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam , na sadasadanirvacanīyatva iti sthāpitam
GSP33yasasi_u:1475: śāstrasyāpi na tatra prāṇāṇyamityāha āgama iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1481: siddhārthe śāstrasya pramāṇabhāve satyapi śāstrasya pramāṇaśabdamātrasya vā nānirvacanīyatvādau pramāṇatvam , na sannāpyasannityāderananvitārthakatvena śabdabodhājanakatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1484: nāsat pratīteḥ , bādhācca na sadityapi yanna tat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1485: pratītereva sat kiṃ na , bādhānnāsat kuto jagat ? /
GSP33yasasi_u:1487: athānumānasyāpi sadasadanirvacanīyatve na pramāṇatvamityāha nāsa diti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1488: prapañcaḥ sadasadbhinnaḥ pratīyamānatve sati bādhyamānatvāditi yuktirapi na satī, prapañca sadasattvavān tata evetyābhāsa samānayogakṣematvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1492: mithyā vā paramārtho vā nādyaḥ kalpo 'yamañjasā // 184 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1496: pramāṇābhāvāddūṣitaṃ sadasadanirvacanīyatvarūpaṃ mithyātvaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi dūṣayati kiñceti
GSP33yasasi_u:1499: naca bhedamithyātvaṃ satyaṃ brahmasvarūpameveti nādvaitahānyādīti vācyam
GSP33yasasi_u:1503: evaṃ mithyātvaṃ nirasya bhedaprapañcasya satyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayan parābhimataṃ sadadvaitaṃ pratikṣeptumupakramate sarvāṇyeveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1505: yathoditamityasya na pratyakṣāderanirvacanīyapratyāyakatvamati pūrvanirūpitānatikrameṇetyarthaḥ tathāhīha ghaṭo 'stīti yeyaṃ dhīrupajāyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1506: sā tadā tasya nābhāvaṃ paṭatvaṃ vānumanyate // 187 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1507: svasvaprameyasyāsato 'bhāvādbhāvāntarebhyaśca vyāvṛttākāratāpratyāyakatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ prasiddhamiti yaduktam , tadevopapādayati tathā hīhe ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1508: ihedānīṃ ghaṭo 'stīti pratītistadānīṃ tatra svāsādhāraṇākāreṇa ghaṭasya sattāmevāvagāhate , nābhāvam -nāsattām , na vā paṭatvādyarthāntaradharmavattāmityaryarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1509: tathā cāsadvyāvṛttaṃ sadantaravyāvṛttaṃ ca vastunaḥ santaṃ ghaṭādikameva pratipādayanti pratītayaḥ ghaṭo 'sti , paṭo 'stītyādaya iti sannānātvameva sidhyati , na sadadvaitamiti bhāvaḥ // nanvastīti yaduktaṃ kiṃ tanmātraṃ ghaṭa ityapi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1514: stor'thāntaraṃ cettena bodhyate tarhi ghaṭāderāpatitaṃ sadasada nirvācya
GSP33yasasi_u:1519: asti brahme tyupaniṣatpratipādyamapi brahmatulyanayātsadasadanirvacanīyaṃ prasajyate ityarthaḥ ānandasatyajñānādinirdeśaureva vaidikaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1522: ānando brahmetyādau ānandādimātraṃ brahmapadenocyate cetpadāntarāmnānavaiyarthyam , tadatiriktabodhane tvānandānānandavilakṣaṇatvādi brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1531: yatkiñcidapi vastu yathā - yena prakāreṇocyate , tasya sarvasya tathā -
GSP33yasasi_u:1535: ghaṭo 'stītyādau sattāmātrasya viśeṣyatvaṃ , tatra ghaṭāderbhedasyāropitatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ pratikṣipanniva svābhimatārthaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1539: svaiḥsvairvyavasthitai rūpaiḥ padārthānāṃ tu yā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1540: sā sattā na svatantra'nyā tatrādvaitakathā katham // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1543: vijātīya sajātīyāntaravyāvartakena svasvāsādhāraṇākāreṇa tasya tasya padārthasya yā sthitiḥ - kālasambandhaḥ pramāṇasambandho vā , sā tattatpadārthasya sattā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1544: sā ca pratipadārthaṃ vyavasthitā , dhātvarthatvātkartṛparatantrā ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:1545: tatsattāyāṃ svatantratvamadvaitaṃ ca bhavadabhimataṃ naiva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1548: tenāpi sādhitaṃ kiñcit saṃvido 'sti na vā tvayā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1549: asti cet pakṣapātaḥ syāt na cette viphalaḥ śramaḥ // 195 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1550: evaṃ prameyabhūtasannānātvaṃ vyavasthāpya pramitinānātvamapi vyavasthāpayati parābhimatacidadvaitanirāsena naceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1551: viṣayāśrayaviśeṣaiḥ pratyakṣādisvagataviśeṣaiścānubhūyamānaṃ saṃvinnānātvamapi na kṣeptuṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1552: atra paraiḥ saṃvido nirviśeṣatve proktamanumānamanūdya pratikṣipati na vedya miti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1553: saṃvidi nirviśeṣatvarūpaḥ sādhyadharma upagamyate na vā , upagamyate cennirnimitta ekasmin dharme pakṣapātaste prasajyate - eko dharma upadamyate , anye prāmāṇikā api nopadamyanta itītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1556: nopeyate cetsādhyadharmaḥ , tarhi tatsādhanārthasaṃrambhavaiyarthaṃ prasajyata ityarthaḥ ataḥsvarasavispaṣṭadṛṣṭabhedāstu saṃvidaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1560: ataḥ - saṃvinnirviśeṣatvādyanumānapratikṣepāt , svarasto viṣayāśrayasvagataviśeṣairviśiṣṭā vilakṣaṇatvena sphuṭaṃ pratīyamānāḥ saṃvidaḥ yathāvasthitairvabāhyair ghaṭādibhirarthairnaikyaṃ yāntītyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1565: etacchlokasyottarārdhaṃ na cāsti citisāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā na cidasti sasāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā sambhāvyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1569: viśeṣeṇa sahopalambhasya vyabhicāre 'pi citsāmānyena sahopalambhaniyamo 'stīti cet , tadapi na samyak , viśeṣavyatiriktasya citsāmānyasyaivānuvṛttasya sarvaviṣayavijñānaviṣayasyābhāvadityarthaḥ yathāmudritapāṭhe tvayamarthaḥ - sahopalambhaniyamo na siddhayati cet sarvaṃ sasāmānyaviseṣaṃ jñātṛjñeyātmakaṃ jñeyajātaṃ jñānabhinnatayāstyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1571: ayaṃ ślokaḥ sahopalambhaniyamā dityādinā prapañca sphuṭamañcatī tyantena anūdyamānaparapakṣa pratikṣepabhāge susaṅgataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1573: ayaṃ ca śloko jñeyajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyasādha kasahopalambhaniyamarūpahetorasiddhipratipādaka iti dhyeyam // 197 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1582: arthaprakāśe niyamena saṃvido bhānāsiddhyarthaṃ tasyāḥ svaprakāśatvamāha yadetaditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1583: svayamprakāśatāpravṛttinimittakaḥ śabdo yasya tat svayaṃprakāśatāśabdaṃ svayaṃprakāśaśabdavācyam
GSP33yasasi_u:1598: evaṃ jñātṛjñeyalakṣaṇārthān mā sma paribhavaḥ, na pratikṣiperityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1599: pratikṣepeṣāṃ kuto na ghaṭate ? tatrāha pratyakṣeṇe , ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1600: balavattarapratyakṣapramāṇasaṃrakṣyamāṇā ete na tvadīyasaṃvidaikyānumānānuvartino jñātṛjñeyabhedā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1602: artheṣu saṃvidaikyasādhanārthaṃ hi arthānāṃ saṃvidaśca svarūpagrahaṇaṃ tāvadapekṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1603: tata eva ca mithasteṣāṃ bhedo 'pi siddha iti pratyakṣabādhitamanumānaṃ na pravartata ityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1604: atra jvālābhedānumānavaiṣamyaprakāro vivṛta ātmasiddhau , tata evānusandheyaḥ // 201 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1609: atra śrīparaśarabhaṭṭāryaśrīsūktiranusandheyā ahamidamabhivedmītyātmabittyorvibhede sphurati yadi tadaikyaṃ bāhyamapyekamastu /
GSP33yasasi_u:1610: pramitirapi mṛṣā syātanmeyamithyātvavāde yadi tadapi saheran dīrdhamasmanmatāyuḥ iti // 202
GSP33yasasi_u:1615: vahneranuṣṇatvānumānamiva pratyakṣabādhitamarthajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyānumānaṃ bhavadīyamiti proktaṃ bhavati // 203 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1617: tavāpi na hi saṃvittiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // 204 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1618: kañci sāhityaṃ bhedaniyataṃ jñānārthayorhetughaṭakaṃ tadabhedasādhane viruddhamityāha kiñce ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1619: saṃvitsaṃvidā sahopalabhyata iti hi tavāpi na sammatam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1620: tatsaṃvidā tatsaṃvidā sahopalabhyamānamarthajātaṃ niyamena tadbhinnameva bhavediti yāvat // nīlādyupaplavāpetasvacchacinmātrasantatiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1630: arthaṃ vinā saṃvido bhāne tāṃ vinār'thasyāpi bhānaṃ siddhiprāyamiti sahopalambhanirūpabhavaduktahetvasiddhiriti pūrvāparasvavacanavirodhamapi na parāmṛṣṭavān bhavānevaṃvadanniti yāvat // 206 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1631: yasmādṛte yadābhāti bhāti ya(ta) smādṛte 'pi tat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1640: ghaṭādṛte bhātātatpaṭādṛte bhānaṃ ghaṭasya yathā sidhyati , tathār'thaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1641: vinābhātājjñānādvinā bhānasarthasya sidhyatīti sahopalambhaniyamo nanīladitaddhiyāṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1642: nanu jñānenaivārthaprakāśasya vācyatvājjñānasya ca svaprakāśatvājjñānabhānaṃ vinārṃ'thabhānaṃ na yujyata iti cedevamapi sahopalambhaniyamo na yujyata eva jñānaviśeṣeṇa jñānasāmānyena vā pūrvatra vyabhicārāt uttaratra paramate 'siddhaśce /
GSP33yasasi_u:1643: idamartha eva sahopalambhaniyama iti 197 tamaḥ ślokaḥ , sa cātrānusandheya iti prāgevoktam
GSP33yasasi_u:1644: evaṃ mitimātṛmeyabhidāyāthātmyaṃ na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti vyavasthāpi tamatreti dhyeyam // (vyā 0) granthabhāgo 'grimaḥ kvāpi neta- samupalabhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1647: prajñānidhirguruvaro mama bhūtapuryāṃ rāmānujārya urukīrtīrayaṃ samindhe
GSP33yasasi_u:1649: aṇṇaṅgarārya iti ca prathitābhidhāno vyākhyābhimāmakaravaṃ prativādibhīkṛta gurupādaprasādena yāmunoktyarṇave tariḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1665: śiromaṇinobhayavedāntaviduṣā pramītaṃ saṃvitsiddharvyākhyānaṃ siddhāñjanaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ vijayatāntamām
